query:
INSERT INTO hotels (tripId, name, address, checkInDate, checkInTime, checkOutDate, checkOutTime, phone, website, notes, sortOrder, createdAt, updatedAt)
SELECT 2 as tripId, name, address, checkInDate, checkInTime, checkOutDate, checkOutTime, phone, website, notes, sortOrder, NOW() as createdAt, NOW() as updatedAt
FROM hotels
WHERE tripId = 1;
